actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to make specific provisions for bail or roller bearing pillow block, flange, take-up, cartridge, and hanger units.

summary.text: Imposes an import duty on ball or roller bearing pillow block, flange, take-up, cartridge, and hanger units under the Tariff Schedules of the United States. (Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to make specific provisions for bail or roller bearing pillow block, flange, take-up, cartridge, and hanger units.
